bs-uemodulepdfsubpages-extension-descrip: Enables recursive export of pages into PDF format with subpages.
bs-uemodulepdfsubpages-widgetlink-subpag: Export this page and all subpages as PDF.
action-uemodulepdfsubpages-export: exporting a page, including all sub pages, to PDF
right-uemodulepdfsubpages-export: Export a page, including all sub pages, to PDF
